languages.text: "Кибербестии — редчайшее чудо нашего сектора, и мне известны все до единого люди, что способны их содержать. Хозяин одного из таких созданий, техножрец-эксплоратор, давно не связывался со мной. Я волнуюсь за его чудесного питомца и протоколы, пропавшие вместе с ним. Работа флота Эксплораторов подразумевает риск, но рисковать своим вернейшим союзником... Возможно, вы сможете отыскать его. Или то, что от него осталось".

"Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."
languages.original_text: "Кибербестии — редчайшее чудо нашего сектора, и мне известны все до единого люди, что способны их содержать. traits.locale_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his amazing pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

languages.text: "Cyber-Bestien sind die seltensten Wunder unseres Sektors, und ich kenne jede Person, die imstande wäre, eine zu halten. Ein Besitzer einer solchen Kreatur, ein Explorator-Techpriester, hat mich seit langer Zeit nicht kontaktiert. Ich mache mir Sorgen um sein wunderbares Tier und die Protokolle, die mit ihm verschwunden sind. Die Arbeit einer Exploratorflotte ist immer gefährlich, aber wer würde das Leben seines treuesten Verbündeten aufs Spiel setzen ...? Vielleicht könnt Ihr ihn aufspüren. Oder das, was von ihm übrig ist."
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

Oder das, was von ihm übrig ist."

languages.text: « Les cyber-bêtes font partie des merveilles de notre secteur. Je connais tous les individus qui en possèdent. Le propriétaire de l'une d'entre elles, un technoprêtre Explorator, ne m'a pas donné signe de vie depuis des lustres. Je m'inquiète pour son magnifique compagnon et les protocoles qui ont disparu avec lui. La mission de la Flotte Explorator n'est pas sans risque, mais aller jusqu'à mettre son plus fidèle compagnon en danger... Vous serez peut-être en mesure de le retrouver. Ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

traits.locale_text: « Les cyber-bêtes font partie des merveilles de notre secteur. Je connais tous les individus qui en possèdent. Je m'inquiète pour son magnifique compagnon et les protocoles qui ont disparu avec lui. La mission de la Flotte Explorator n'est pas sans risque, mais aller jusqu'à mettre son plus fidèle compagnon en danger... Vous serez peut-être en mesure de le retrouver. Ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »

languages.text: “生化使仆是这个星区最为罕见的奇迹，所有有能力饲养这种使仆的人，我都了如指掌。不过，其中一只使仆的主人，开拓者舰队的某个技术神甫，已经很久都没联系过我了。我很担心他那只奇妙的使仆，也很担心那些协议是否安全。开拓者舰队的职责确实是有风险的，可如果要将最忠诚的盟友置于危险之中……或许你能找到他，或者说，找到他的残骸。”
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

traits.locale_text: “生化使仆是这个星区最为罕见的奇迹，所有有能力饲养这种使仆的人，我都了如指掌。不过，其中一只使仆的主人，开拓者舰队的某个技术神甫，已经很久都没联系过我了。我很担心他那只奇妙的使仆，也很担心那些协议是否安全。开拓者舰队的职责确实是有风险的，可如果要将最忠诚的盟友置于危险之中……或许你能找到他，或者说，找到他的残骸。”

languages.text: «Las ciberbestias son la maravilla más escasa de nuestro sector, y conozco a todas las personas que cumplen los requisitos para cuiadrlas. El propietario de una de ellas, un tecnosacerdote explorador, hace mucho tiempo que no contacta conmigo. Me preocupan su magnífica mascota y los protocolos que desaparecieron con él. El trabajo de una Flota Exploradora es arriesgado por naturaleza, pero poner en peligro también la vida de su aliado más fiel... Quizá pueda encontrarle. O lo que quede de él».
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

traits.locale_text: «Las ciberbestias son la maravilla más escasa de nuestro sector, y conozco a todas las personas que cumplen los requisitos para cuiadrlas. El propietario de una de ellas, un tecnosacerdote explorador, hace mucho tiempo que no contacta conmigo. Me preocupan su magnífica mascota y los protocolos que desaparecieron con él. El trabajo de una Flota Exploradora es arriesgado por naturaleza, pero poner en peligro también la vida de su aliado más fiel... Quizá pueda encontrarle. O lo que quede de él».

languages.text: 「サイバービーストは私たちの星域で最も希少な奇跡であり、それを飼育する技術を持つ者は誰一人として見逃しません。そうした生き物の一体の所有者である探索技術司祭は長い間私に連絡をしてきません。彼の素晴らしいペットと彼と共に失われたプロトコルのことが心配です。探索艦隊の任務は本質的に危険を伴いますが、最も忠実な盟友の命を賭けるとは…おそらくあなたなら彼を見つけられるでしょう。あるいは、彼に残されたものを」
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."

traits.locale_text: 「サイバービーストは私たちの星域で最も希少な奇跡であり、それを飼育する技術を持つ者は誰一人として見逃しません。そうした生き物の一体の所有者である探索技術司祭は長い間私に連絡をしてきません。彼の素晴らしいペットと彼と共に失われたプロトコルのことが心配です。探索艦隊の任務は本質的に危険を伴いますが、最も忠実な盟友の命を賭けるとは…おそらくあなたなら彼を見つけられるでしょう。あるいは、彼に残されたものを」

languages.text: "Siber hayvanlar, sektörümüzdeki en nadir harikalar arasında yer alır ve ben, bu varlıkları yaşatabilecek herkesi tanırım. Böyle bir canavara sahip Keşiftör bir Tekno Rahip, uzun süredir benimle iletişime geçmedi. Hem o harika yaratık hem de onunla beraber kaybolan protokoller için endişeliyim. Bir Keşiftör Filosu'nun görevi her zaman tehlikelidir ama en sadık yoldaşının hayatını riske atmak... Belki onu ya da ondan geriye kalanları siz bulabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Cyber-beasts are the rarest of our sector's marvels, and I know every single person who has what it takes to keep one. The owner of one such creature, an Explorator Tech-Priest, has not contacted me in a long time. I am worried for his wondrous pet and the protocols that went missing with him. An Explorator Fleet's work is inherently risky, but to put the life of one's most loyal ally on the line... Perhaps you will be able to find him. Or what is left of him."
